reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.reviews: Excellent teacher, explains complex concepts clearly. Assignments can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.reviews: Passionate about the subject, engaging lectures. Always available for office hours.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable but sometimes disorganized. Grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.reviews: Great lab instructor, brings real-world examples to class. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.reviews: Captivating storyteller, makes history come alive. Assignments encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.reviews: Brilliant researcher but struggles to explain concepts to undergrads. Harsh grader.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.reviews: Insightful lectures, encourages class participation. Heavy workload but worth it.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.reviews: Thorough explanations but can be dry. Homework is challenging but helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.reviews: Thought-provoking discussions, relates topics to current events. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.reviews: Clear lecturer, uses practical examples. Exams can be tricky but reflect the material.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about art, engaging presentations. Field trips are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable but can be biased. Encourages debate but sometimes dominates discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.reviews: Enthusiastic about sustainability, practical assignments. Can be disorganized at times.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.reviews: Excellent at explaining complex concepts, helpful during office hours. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.reviews: Stimulating discussions, encourages critical thinking. Reading list is extensive but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.reviews: Passionate about space, uses multimedia effectively. Star-gazing sessions are unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable but lectures can be dry. Assignments are interesting but grading is strict.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.reviews: Engaging field trips, brings rocks to life. Exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.reviews: Industry experience brings valuable insights. Group projects are well-designed and relevant.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.reviews: Skilled musician and teacher, patient with beginners. Coursework is demanding but rewarding.
